thread.title: CPAC Audience Shouts ‘CNN!’ When Hannity Asks Which News Outlet Was the ‘Worst’ During Election
thread.title_full: CPAC Audience Shouts ‘CNN!’ When Hannity Asks Which News Outlet Was the ‘Worst’ During Election

author: Josh Feldman
title: CPAC Audience Shouts ‘CNN!’ When Hannity Asks Which News Outlet Was the ‘Worst’ During Election
text:
CPAC Audience Shouts ‘CNN!’ When Hannity Asks Which News Outlet Was the ‘Worst’ During Election by Josh Feldman | 11:00   
Sean Hannity taped his show earlier today at CPAC, and at one point during his opening monologue he fired up the crowd by talking about the bias of the liberal media. 
He said to the audience that WikiLeaks revelations of collusion was “the single most corrupt, revealing moment about media bias” and propaganda. 
There was a big shout of “FAKE NEWS!” from many in the crowd and Hannity asked them, “Of all the media outlets, which one was the worst?” 
There was a massive cry of “CNN!” that Hannity egged on a little. 
“The media is against our president,” he said. “We have Democrats against the president. We have freaky weird snowflakes against the president. And we even have weak Republicans against the president.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
